mapper.select: select com.comment_id,com.user_id,com.content,com.created_day,com.parent_id,(select count(comment_id) from vote where vote.comment_id = com.comment_id)cvoCnt from comments com where post_id=#{post_id} order by ref asc,lev asc
select NVL(count(comment_id),0) cnt from comments where post_id=#{post_id}
mapper.update: update comments set content=#{content} where comment_id=#{comment_id}
mapper.select: select count(comment_id) from comments where ref=#{ref}
select ref from comments where comment_id=#{comment_id}
select com.user_id,com.content,com.created_day,(select count(comment_id) from vote where vote.comment_id = com.comment_id)cvoCnt from comments com where rownum<=3 order by cvocnt desc
select content,user_id from comments where rownum<=5 order by created_day desc
